IT Support.EXPLANATION: The percentage of time that a system is operational and available.
IT Support.FORMULA: (Total Uptime / Total Time) * 100

IT Support.EXPLANATION: The delay between sending and receiving data over a network.
IT Support.FORMULA: Average Time for a Data Packet to Travel from Source to Destination

IT Support.EXPLANATION: The average time taken to respond to IT incidents.
IT Support.FORMULA: Average Time from Incident Detection to Initial Response

IT Support.EXPLANATION: The average cost of IT services and support per user.
IT Support.FORMULA: Total IT Costs / Total Number of Users

IT Support.EXPLANATION: Measures the efficiency and effectiveness of system operations.
IT Support.FORMULA: (Total Performance Metrics Achieved / Total Performance Metrics Expected) * 100

IT Support.EXPLANATION: The ability of the infrastructure to handle increasing loads.
IT Support.FORMULA: (Performance Improvement with Increased Resources / Initial Performance) * 100

IT Support.EXPLANATION: Measures usersâ€™ satisfaction with IT services provided.
IT Support.FORMULA: (Sum of User Satisfaction Ratings / Number of Users Surveyed)

IT Support.EXPLANATION: The average time required to repair a system or component after a failure.
IT Support.FORMULA: Total Repair Time / Number of Repairs

IT Support.EXPLANATION: Measures the quality of the code through various metrics.
IT Support.FORMULA: (Number of Code Review Issues / Total Lines of Code Reviewed) * 100

IT Support.EXPLANATION: The number of bugs found per unit of code.
IT Support.FORMULA: (Number of Bugs / Total Lines of Code) * 100

IT Support.EXPLANATION: Measures the amount of work completed in each sprint.
IT Support.FORMULA: Total Story Points Completed in a Sprint / Number of Sprints

IT Support.EXPLANATION: The frequency of new releases or updates to the system.
IT Support.FORMULA: Total Number of Deployments / Time Period

IT Support.EXPLANATION: The time taken from making a change request to deploying the change.
IT Support.FORMULA: Time from Change Request to Deployment

IT Support.EXPLANATION: The number of bugs reported by customers.
IT Support.FORMULA: Number of Bugs Reported by Customers

IT Support.EXPLANATION: Measures the amount of work remaining versus the amount of work completed over time.
IT Support.FORMULA: (Remaining Work / Total Work) * 100

IT Support.EXPLANATION: Measures how often new features are used by customers.
IT Support.FORMULA: (Number of Users Using Feature / Total Number of Users) * 100

IT Support.EXPLANATION: The degree to which data correctly represents the real-world value.
IT Support.FORMULA: (Number of Accurate Data Entries / Total Data Entries) * 100

IT Support.EXPLANATION: Measures whether all required data is present.
IT Support.FORMULA: (Number of Complete Data Entries / Total Data Entries) * 100

IT Support.EXPLANATION: Measures the efficiency of data queries.
IT Support.FORMULA: (Average Query Response Time / Target Query Response Time) * 100

IT Support.EXPLANATION: The time taken to generate reports from data.
IT Support.FORMULA: Total Time for Report Generation / Number of Reports

IT Support.EXPLANATION: Measures the extent to which available data is used for decision-making.
IT Support.FORMULA: (Actual Data Utilized / Total Available Data) * 100

IT Support.EXPLANATION: Overall score representing the quality of data based on multiple criteria.
IT Support.FORMULA: (Sum of Quality Ratings / Number of Data Records)

IT Support.EXPLANATION: The time taken to generate actionable insights from data.
IT Support.FORMULA: Total Time to Generate Insights / Number of Insights Generated

IT Support.EXPLANATION: The number of security incidents affecting data.
IT Support.FORMULA: Total Number of Data Security Incidents

IT Support.EXPLANATION: The amount of time that integration systems are unavailable.
IT Support.FORMULA: Total Downtime Due to Integration Issues / Total Scheduled Integration Time

IT Support.EXPLANATION: The speed at which data is transferred across systems.
IT Support.FORMULA: Total Amount of Data Transferred / Total Time for Transfer

IT Support.EXPLANATION: The percentage of successful integrations versus total integration attempts.
IT Support.FORMULA: (Number of Successful Integrations / Total Integrations Attempted) * 100

IT Support.EXPLANATION: Measures how well the system works with different platforms or software.
IT Support.FORMULA: (Number of Compatible Systems / Total Systems Tested) * 100

IT Support.EXPLANATION: The time taken to complete an integration from start to finish.
IT Support.FORMULA: Total Time for Integration Process / Number of Integrations

IT Support.EXPLANATION: The percentage of errors that occur during data transfers.
IT Support.FORMULA: (Number of Errors in Data Transfers / Total Data Transfers) * 100

IT Support.EXPLANATION: The time it takes for the system to respond to a request.
IT Support.FORMULA: Average Time Taken for System to Respond to Requests

IT Support.EXPLANATION: The percentage of users who start using a new system or feature.
IT Support.FORMULA: (Number of Users Adopting the System / Total Number of Target Users) * 100

IT Support.EXPLANATION: The total count of security breaches or issues.
IT Support.FORMULA: Total Number of Security Incidents

IT Support.EXPLANATION: The average time taken to detect a security incident.
IT Support.FORMULA: Total Time Taken to Detect Security Incidents / Number of Incidents

IT Support.EXPLANATION: The average time taken to resolve a security incident.
IT Support.FORMULA: Total Time Taken to Resolve Security Incidents / Number of Incidents

IT Support.EXPLANATION: Measures adherence to established security policies.
IT Support.FORMULA: (Number of Compliant Actions / Total Actions Required by Policies) * 100

IT Support.EXPLANATION: The average time to fix vulnerabilities after they are discovered.
IT Support.FORMULA: Total Time to Apply Vulnerability Patches / Number of Vulnerabilities

IT Support.EXPLANATION: The percentage of employees who complete security awareness training.
IT Support.FORMULA: (Number of Employees Completed Training / Total Employees Required to Complete Training) * 100

IT Support.EXPLANATION: Measures the effectiveness of systems in detecting unauthorized access attempts.
IT Support.FORMULA: (Number of Intrusions Detected / Total Number of Intrusions Attempted) * 100

IT Support.EXPLANATION: The severity of impact from data breaches.
IT Support.FORMULA: (Cost of Data Breach / Total Revenue) * 100
